Scripts.OnMouseDown: if (arg1 == "RightButton") then DoReadyCheck() else ShowUIPanel(AWMReadyCheckMenu) end
Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Ready Check"); if UnitInRaid('player') then GameTooltip:AddLine('Left Click to Ready Check UI.', 1,1,1) GameTooltip:AddLine('Right Click to start a Ready Check.', 1,1,1) else GameTooltip:AddLine('You must be in a raid group', 1,1,1) GameTooltip:AddLine('to use this feature.', 1,1,1) end GameTooltip:Show()
